name: Rect.Builder
description: The Rect.Builder class provides a fluent interface for creating Rect instances with method chaining. It's the recommended way to create rectangles with complex configurations or when you need to set multiple properties in a readable manner.
overview:
The `Rect.Builder` class allows you to construct `Rect` objects through a chain of method calls, making the configuration process more readable and maintainable. Instead of passing multiple parameters to constructors, you can set properties individually using descriptive method names.

The builder is typically obtained through the `Draw2D.rect()` method and provides two final operations:
- `build()` - Creates the Rect instance
- `buildAndAdd()` - Creates the Rect instance and automatically adds it to the Draw2D context

methods.name: pos
methods.signature: pos(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
methods.description: Sets the rectangle position using two opposite corners in a single call.

parameters.name: x1
parameters.description: X coordinate of the first corner

parameters.name: y1
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the first corner

parameters.name: x2
parameters.description: X coordinate of the second corner

parameters.name: y2
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the second corner

methods.name: pos1
methods.description: Sets the position of the first corner.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the first corner

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the first corner

methods.name: pos2
methods.description: Sets the position of the second corner.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the second corner

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the second corner

methods.name: x1
methods.description: Sets only the X coordinate of the first corner.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the first corner

methods.name: y1
methods.description: Sets only the Y coordinate of the first corner.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the first corner

methods.name: x2
methods.description: Sets only the X coordinate of the second corner.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the second corner

methods.name: y2
methods.description: Sets only the Y coordinate of the second corner.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the second corner

methods.name: size
methods.description: Sets both width and height of the rectangle.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Width of the rectangle in pixels

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Height of the rectangle in pixels

methods.name: width
methods.description: Sets only the width of the rectangle.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Width of the rectangle in pixels

methods.name: height
methods.description: Sets only the height of the rectangle.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Height of the rectangle in pixels

methods.name: color
methods.description: Sets the rectangle color using RGB format with full alpha.

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: RGB color value (0xRRGGBB)

methods.name: color
methods.description: Sets the rectangle color using RGB format with custom alpha.

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: RGB color value (0xRRGGBB)

parameters.name: alpha
parameters.description: Alpha transparency value (0-255)

methods.name: color
methods.signature: color(int r, int g, int b)
methods.description: Sets the rectangle color using separate RGB values with full alpha.

parameters.name: r
parameters.description: Red component (0-255)

parameters.name: g
parameters.description: Green component (0-255)

parameters.name: b
parameters.description: Blue component (0-255)

methods.name: color
methods.signature: color(int r, int g, int b, int a)
methods.description: Sets the rectangle color using separate RGBA values.

parameters.name: r
parameters.description: Red component (0-255)

parameters.name: g
parameters.description: Green component (0-255)

parameters.name: b
parameters.description: Blue component (0-255)

parameters.name: a
parameters.description: Alpha component (0-255)

methods.name: alpha
methods.description: Sets only the alpha transparency value while preserving RGB color.

parameters.name: alpha
parameters.description: Alpha transparency value (0-255)

methods.name: rotation
methods.description: Sets the rotation angle of the rectangle (clockwise).

parameters.name: degrees
parameters.description: Rotation angle in degrees

methods.name: rotateCenter
methods.description: Sets whether the rectangle should rotate around its center point.

parameters.name: centerEnabled
parameters.description: true to rotate around center, false to rotate around origin

methods.name: zIndex
methods.description: Sets the z-index for rendering order. Higher values render on top.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Z-index value

methods.name: build
methods.description: Creates the configured Rect instance without adding it to the Draw2D context.

methods.name: buildAndAdd
methods.description: Creates the configured Rect instance and automatically adds it to the Draw2D context.
examples:
const rect = draw2D.rect()
    .pos(10, 10, 110, 60)
    .color(0x00FF00)
    .buildAndAdd(); // Automatically added to Draw2D context
